title: Radhiye Radhiye Lyrics-Aayiram Vilakku song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Harish Ragavendra, Chinmayi   

Song    :  Radhiye Radhiye

Movie  : Aayiram Vilakku

Lyrics:  Vairamuthu



Radhiye en radhiye agilam neeyadi

Sagiye en sagiye un sagalam naanadi ..(2)



Kenji kenji oru valiseikiraai

Konji konji ennai kolai seikirai

Unnai parkum munnale, kadavul kooda poi endren

Un kannnai partha pinnale, kadavul undu enkinren



Radhiye en radhiye agilam neeyadi

Sagiye en sagiye un sagalam naanadi.. (2)



Odam nee, manmadha madi maadam nee

Aeipulangalin padam nee

Iravukku oru aeni nee

Kallan nee, katti anaikayil vallan nee

yenadhu udaigalin villan nee

En pudavaikul oru thaeni nee



Koodhal madham undhan koondhal porvaiyagum

Veyil madham andha koondhal visiriyagum

Kavi sollum podhu kalaivanan neeye

Karpukkul nulayum kalavani neeye

Un palmugam parkaiyil budhanai agiren

Un bakiyai parkayil pithanai pogiren, pogiren ...



Nee parthal narabukul siru poo pookum

Aelubukul adhu thaen varkum

vetkam vidai kondu pogumm...

Nee parthal nadu mudhugil oru nandoorum

vayasukul oru vandoorum

Vaanvizhaigalum maarum



Rendu pookkal vendum endru solai vandhai

Solai ellam sondham kollum velai seidhai

Van megam vizha vinkaatru podhum

Aan-yaanai vizha mundhaanai podhum

Ven megangal pogayil oviyam parkiren

Andha oviyam yavizhilum unmugam parkiren, parkiren ...



Radhiye en radhiye agilam neeyadi

Sagiye en sagiye un sagalam naanadi.. (2)



Kenji kenji oru valiseikiraai

Konji konji ennai kolai seikirai

Unnai parkum munnale, kadavul kooda poi endren

Un kannnai partha pinnale, kadavul undu enkinren
